entities.description: Ackerley is mentioned as someone who sat down.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and has a desire to join the Ravenclaw table.

entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: Ravenclaw house is mentioned as one of the four houses in the school.

entities.name: baddock
entities.description: Baddock is a student who joins the Slytherin table and is clapped by Malfoy.

entities.name: malcolm baddock
entities.description: Malcolm Baddock is mentioned as someone who joined the Slytherin table.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin house is mentioned as one of the four houses in the school and has turned out more Dark witches and wizards than any other.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student who claps for Baddock when he joins the Slytherin table.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of Harry's friends and hisses at Malcolm Baddock.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is one of Harry's friends and hisses at Malcolm Baddock.

entities.name: branstone
entities.description: Branstone is a student who joins the Hufflepuff table.

entities.name: eleanor branstone
entities.description: Eleanor Branstone is mentioned as someone who joined the Hufflepuff table.

relationships.description: Harry has a desire to join the Ravenclaw table.
